evidence.claim: Optimatum leverages AWS for cloud computing services.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data management.
Kafka is used for real-time data streaming and processing.
Azure services are utilized for data integration and application development.
HL7 protocols are followed for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or specific healthcare claims-related use cases.
